data.name: The Golden Eyed Ghosts
data.detailed_description:
The Golden Eyed Ghosts is a gothic Souls-like Metroidvania where you must recover the kingdom’s stolen artifacts at all costs. Experience dark fantasy and cosmic horror in 2D.


Explore an ancient world without any hand-holding or guides. Traverse sinister forests, glittering icefields, murky bogs, decaying cities, and beyond in search of the kingdom’s legendary weapons.

Struggle to survive against the festering beasts hidden in the labyrinth and the eldritch secrets that eat away at you.




Your choices impact the world. Track down a thief, befriend a suffering maiden, aid a desperate father. Someone will return a favor. You will be betrayed. Bodies in ditches will look familiar.

There are no right or wrong answers.




You decide whether your victims live or die. Evade enemies by dodging attacks or slaughter them all in hack-and-slash combat. Heal yourself by dealing damage, or rest at scattered grindstones - they remind you of home.

Build an impressive arsenal of equipment: daggers, flails, swords, spears, bows, throwing knives, explosives, and arcane weapons. Mix and match to adapt to new enemies, and upgrade your gear with ore fragments to take on more powerful monsters.

data.short_description: IT’S A DEATH SENTENCE. Recover the kingdom’s stolen artifacts in this gothic Souls-like Metroidvania. Face hack-and-slash combat, cruel world-changing decisions, and the madness of an eldritch realm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: N/A
